articles.title: Nikki Haley Says She Is Last Hope Of Stopping "Trump-Biden Nightmare" - NDTV
articles.description: Indian-American Nikki Haley, who finished third in the Iowa caucuses, has said that she is the only Republican candidate who could take on frontrunner Donald Trump and incumbent President Joe Biden and avert a "Trump-Biden nightmare".
articles.content:
Nikki Haley, former US Ambassador to the UN, came third with nearly 20% of the votes polled.
